title: Ennu Swantham Punyalan
overview: Thomas, a reluctant priest is forced into ordination to fulfill his mother's vow. His peaceful existence at the church mansion is disrupted when a young woman, seeking refuge from her troubles, unexpectedly arrives. To complicate matters, a mischievous thief sneaks into the same room, setting the stage for a series of chaotic and humorous encounters. As the unlikely trio navigates misunderstandings and dilemmas, they uncover heartfelt connections and unexpected revelations in this entertaining tale of faith, humanity, and redemption.
